name: Question Set
description: Composite quiz with multiple question types. Perfect for comprehensive quizzes, chapter tests, and final assessments.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate a quiz with mixed question types. Each question has a type and params that match the specific question type format.

schema.title: string - Quiz title

introPage.showIntroPage: boolean - Whether to show an intro page (default: true)
introPage.title: string - Intro page title

questions.params: object - Parameters specific to the question type (see below)

schema.passPercentage: number - Minimum score percentage to pass (default: 50)

multiple_choice.question: string - The question text
multiple_choice.image_prompt: string (optional) - Description of an image to illustrate this question

true_false.isTrue: boolean - Whether the statement is true
true_false.image_prompt: string (optional) - Description of an image to illustrate this statement

fill_blanks.image_prompt: string (optional) - Description of an image to illustrate this question

drag_words.image_prompt: string (optional) - Description of an image to illustrate this question

mark_words.image_prompt: string (optional) - Description of an image to illustrate this question

introPage.title: Cell Biology Quiz
introPage.introduction: Test your knowledge of cell biology concepts. This quiz covers organelles, functions, and cell processes.

params.question: What organelle is known as the powerhouse of the cell?
params.explanation: Mitochondria produce ATP through cellular respiration.
params.image_prompt: A colorful educational illustration of a mitochondria inside an animal cell, showing the inner membrane folds (cristae) and ATP molecules being produced

params.statement: Plant cells have cell walls made of cellulose.
params.explanation: Plant cells have a rigid cell wall made of cellulose, unlike animal cells.

params.text: The *nucleus* contains the cell's genetic material in the form of *DNA*.
The *cell membrane* controls what enters and exits the cell through *selective permeability*.
The *ribosome* and *endoplasmic reticulum* work together to *synthesize* proteins.
params.instruction: Click on the organelles and their function.
